name: I'm not a programmer
description:
LOADING WILL TAKE AWHILE

Used AI Art with StableDiffusion  to make over 100 backgrounds. After I made the backgrounds I realized I wanted animated backgrounds. So i used Disco Diffusion with a google colab, didn't want to pay for colab pro but was able to render 30 frames unfortunately that is not enough for the game background. I would have liked to get animated ai art but it was going to take way to long but thankfully i still had the stable diffusion backgrounds so i used that.

Also wanted AI to make the character and enemy sprite but i learned ai can not do frame animation it's good for like concepts or starting points but not for actual development. I ended up just doing a quick fun cycle in photoshop.

This was fun, would like to continue experimenting with AI art and generating game assets with AI.
